description: Defines the ActivityEvent entity class for persisting activity events in the database, including attributes like user, event type, details, and timestamp.

classes.name: ActivityEvent
classes.description: Entity class representing an activity event with properties like user, type, details, and timestamp, mapped to the 'activity_events' table.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the activity event.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Returns the user associated with the activity event.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Sets the user associated with the activity event.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of activity event (e.g., commit, pr_opened).

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Sets the type of activity event.

methods.name: getDetails
methods.description: Returns additional details about the event.

methods.name: setDetails
methods.description: Sets additional details about the event.

methods.name: getOccurredAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the event occurred.

methods.name: setOccurredAt
methods.description: Sets the timestamp when the event occurred.
